prereq.p: The following steps assume that you have a domain model file in your project containing the dataset you want to extend.

step.cmd: In the DS Navigator view pane, double-click the domain model file that you want to work with.
step.stepresult: The file and its elements are displayed in the Editor area.

step.cmd: In the Editor area, right-click a dataset and select New Class Attribute .
Click on the newly created property.
Go to the Properties view pane, located below the Editor area, and complete the fields to edit the class property's properties.
